activities: American Eagle Outfitters, Inc., and its subsidiaries and affiliates, will be operating retail stores, employing individuals and collecting customer information.  We will collect employee personal information for business and legal compliance purposes, and customer personal information for customer service, analytics, and marketing purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: employee and customer data as described above
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU DPAs and the Swiss FDPIC; for all other data: ICDR/AAA alternative dispute resolution (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program).
